text.easy_npc.armourers_workshop.no_supp: The skin model %1$s for %2$s is not official supported with Armourer's Workshop yet! Please use the official recommended skin models like the humanoid model instead.
text.easy_npc.invalid_remote_image:
The remote image is invalid or not accessible!
Pleas check the URL and try again.
text.easy_npc.item.easy_npc_preset: ► Right click on empty place to spawn the NPC.
text.easy_npc.item.easy_npc_preset_empty: ► Right click on an NPC to save their settings as a new preset.
text.easy_npc.item.move_easy_npc: Select the EasyNPC with the right mouse button and move it with the left mouse button to the targeted position.
text.easy_npc.item.spawn_rect_wand: Right-click block to set corner 1. Shift+Right-click to set corner 2. Right-click air to manage spawn rects.
text.easy_npc.item.custom_data_test: Right click to verify custom item data.
text.easy_npc.trading.busy:
%1$s is currently busy with another trade with %2$s.
 Please wait until the trade is finished.
tooltip.easy_npc.spawner.boss_spawner: The Boss Spawner is a special spawner that allows you to spawn a boss NPC.
tooltip.easy_npc.spawner.default_spawner: The Default Spawner is a spawner that allows you to spawn a default NPC.
tooltip.easy_npc.spawner.group_spawner: The Group Spawner is a spawner that allows you to spawn a group of NPCs.
tooltip.easy_npc.spawner.single_spawner: The Single Spawner is a spawner that allows you to spawn a single NPC.
